name: MeStar
intro: The best voxel Metaverse to play, create and explore
introduce: MeStar is a multi-module game platform that supports users to play, create, and manage in the diverse Metaverse. MeStar provides players with a voxel sandbox game where they can build the desired scene in the form of three-dimensional blocks. In addition, MeStar also offers an NFT creation tool embedded in the game and allows players to cast their creations into NFTs on a blockchain. More importantly, MeStar supports players to open and manage their business worlds (private servers) on the platform based on the MeStar World NFTs.
